Title: Chen's Resolution
Description:
You know what? I don't have to take this.

I'll show that Uncle Gao what it means to be a real brewer. I'll brew the best beer he's ever tasted, with ingredients I've never even used before.

I'm Chen Stormstout, and I'm the best brewer alive.
ObjectivesText: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at Halfhill.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
